verses.text: Ha exxo patrón ex, tojolnhej tzeyutej e b'ha t'a eb' e checab', wach' tzeyutej e b'ha t'a eb'. Tze nacoti to ay junxo t'a satcha’anh tzex ak'an mandar, aton Cajal Jesús.
Ha exxo e masanil, tzex lesalvi val t'a smasanil e k'ool d'ha Dios t'a masanil tiempo. Tzeyak'anpax yuj diosal t'ay.
Anhejtona', tzex lesalvi pax cuuj, yic wach' ol och Dios Cajal qued'oc, yic ol yal calanel slolonel yet' yab'ixal Cristo ak'b'ilxo cojtaquejeli. Ha ticnaic preso vaji, yujto svalel yab'ixal tik.
Lesalvanhec vuuj, yic ol yal valanel yab'ixal Cristo t'a stojolal.
Ayic tze k'uman eb' manto creyenteoc t'a juntac el, wach' tzeyutej e b'ha t'a eb'.
Wach'nhej tzeyutej e loloni, tze ch'oxanel e wach'k'olal t'a eb'. Tato icha chi' ol nachajel eyuuj tas ol aj e pacan tas sk'anb'ej junjun eb' t'ayex.
Ha winh cuk'tac Tíquico tik, xajan val winh cuuj. Tek'an val smunlaj winh t'a co Mam Dios. Ayoch winh yak'an servil Cajal Jesús ved'oc. Ol b'at winh yal t'ayex tastac caj t'a tik.
Tzin checpaxb'at winh t'ayex ta' yic ol yak' yip e k'ool winh.
Anhejtona' ol b'at pax winh cuk'tac Onésimo yet' winh. Ha winhaj Onésimo tik, eyetchonhab' winh, te xajan winh cuuj. Tek'anxo winh. Aton chavanh eb' winh tik ol b'at alan t'ayex tastac caj t'a tik.

Axo pax winhaj Aristarco, preso yaj winh ved' t'a tik. Syak'paxb'at stzatzil e k'ool winh. Yed' winhaj Marcos, aton winh sk'ab' yoc sb'a yet' winhaj Bernabé, syak'paxb'at stzatzil e k'ool winh. Valnacxo t'ayex yuj winhaj Marcos tik, tato ol b'at winh ta', tze cha winh sk'och t'a tzalajk'olal.

Axo winhaj Jesús tik, aton winh scuch pax Justo, syak'paxb'at stzatzil e k'ool winh. Ha t'a skal eb' winh smunlaj ved'oc, anhej eb' winh chavanh tik vetisraelal. Tz'ek' eb' winh yaleli chajtil tz'aj yoch eb' anima t'a yol sk'ab' Dios. Ha eb' winh chavanh tik, syak' val snivanil in k'ool eb' winh.

Ha winh eyetchonhab' Epafras tik, ayoch pax winh yak'an servil Cristo ved'oc. Slesalvi val winh eyuuj, yic tzex wach' tek'k'aji, yic anhej val juntzanh tas sgana Dios b'aj tze wach' aq'uejoch e pensar.
Ha in tik, svak' testigoal in b'a, svalani to tzex sna winh. Snaanpaxb'at eb' ay t'a Laodicea winh yet' eb' ay t'a Hierápolis.
Axo winhaj Lucas, winh anhtum, xajan val winh cuuj yet' pax winhaj Demas, syak'paxb'at stzatzil e k'ool eb' winh.
Scak'paxb'at stzatzil sk'ool eb' creyente ay t'a Laodicea. Scak'anpaxb'at stzatzil sk'ool ix canab' Ninfas yet' eb' creyente smolb'ej sb'ha t'a spat ix.

Ayic ol lajvoc eyavtan jun carta tik t'a yichanh eb' creyente ta', tzeyak'paxb'at t'a eb' aj Laodicea, yic wach' ol avtaj pax t'a skal eb' ta'. Axo tze chaan sk'och jun carta ol yak'paxta eb' aj Laodicea chi' t'ayex, tzeyavtej paxi.
Axo t'a winh cuk'tac Arquipo, tzeyal t'a winh icha tik: Ak'val ip a munlaj t'a jun opisio ix yak' Cajal Jesús tik t'ayach, xe chi t'a winh.
Ha in Pablo in tik, a in val lak'an tzin tz'ib'ejb'at jun stzatzil e k'ool tik. Naeccoti to preso vaj t'a tik. Yak'ocab' swach'k'olal Dios t'ayex ta'.
